svg.text: WELCOME TO UCSD COMMIT CHALLENGE 2025 âŠ† WELCOME TO THE ANNUAL COMMIT CHALLENGE 2025 âŠ† THE GOAL IS TO MAKE CONTRIBUTIONS âŠ† A COMMIT EVERY DAY âŠ† BUILD SOMETHING THAT CAN BE CONSIDERED MEANINGFUL âŠ† DEPLOYABLE BY THE END OF THE YEAR âŠ† HOPEFULLY âŠ† ðŸš€ FISH âŠ†
